title: COVID-19 Resources and Information
description: Learn more about how the City of Seattle is responding to COVID-19.
cleaned_text: Proclamation Ends The City of Seattle is ending its COVID-19 Civil Emergency Proclamation after October 31, 2022. The City's testing and vaccination web pages are no longer available. [View other policies and programs that are affected by this change](https://harrell.seattle.gov/2022/10/11/seattle-covid-emergency-proclamation-to-end-after-october-31/). Related Resources [](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html) COVID-19 Guidance from the CDC Learn about COVID-19 vaccines, symptom self-check, and data from the national Centers for Disease Control.
